abstract: Charleston's Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church memorializes Rev DePayne Middleton-Doctor, another victim of church massacre; Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr visits church and adds his prayers in brief speech.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. DePayne Middleton-Doctor was memorialized, after what the authorities described as the racially motivated murder of nine people inside one of the Deep South’s most historic churches.

headline.main: As Charleston Church Mourns, Biden Adds His Prayers
headline.print_headline: As Church Mourns, Biden Adds His Prayers

snippet: The Rev. DePayne Middleton-Doctor was memorialized, after what the authorities described as the racially motivated murder of nine people inside one of the Deep South’s most historic churches.
